column5: Can someone please help me find a link to the current regulations for the Lak Air get together on Lake Nipissing. I have been running around in circles looking at alot of sites that I am not sure pertain to the place we are fishing.  Thanks in advance  Art
Here ya go Big Boy!!!  http://www.mnr.gov.on.ca/MNR_E001331.pdf  We'll be fishin zone 11 this year!

Be sure to read the "exceptions" for lake Nip.  Pike are as follows for the West Arm and West Bay:  Northern Pike /Sportsmans license= 4  Not more than 2 greater than 61 cm. (24") of which not more than 1 is greater than 86 cm. (33.9")
Yup - I made a photocopy of the regs to have them in the boat with us.
So, ya REALLY think you'll catch sump'n
Ya never know Jack, but if we don't... it won't be from lack of tryin'!!!
